# Section 4 {Abhishek Sinha}
```{r Getting Data, echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
data_sec4 <- read.csv("Data/Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019.txt", header = TRUE, sep = ',')
```

```{r structure, echo=FALSE}
glimpse(data_sec4)
```

```{r , echo=FALSE}
unique(data_sec4$Offence.Division)
```

```{r filtering data, echo=FALSE}
data_sec4 %>% filter(Offence.Division == "B Property and deception offences")

unique(data_sec4$Offence.Subdivision)

data_final <- data_sec4 %>% filter(Offence.Subdivision == "B30 Burglary/Break and enter")

data_final
```

```{r}
data_final <- data_final %>% 
  mutate(Incidents.Recorded = as.numeric(Incidents.Recorded))
glimpse(data_final)
```

```{r Crime-Rates,echo = FALSE, fig.align = "center", fig.width = 6, fig.cap = "Crime Rate of Burglary"}
crime_year_offence <- data_final %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  mutate(Total_Incidents = sum(Incidents.Recorded, na.rm = TRUE))


ggplot(crime_year_offence,
       aes(x = Year,
           y = Total_Incidents)) + 
  geom_line()
```
